per_frame_init_8=t0=time;
per_frame_1=q6=aspecty;    t=t+.5/fps;    t1=t1+1/fps;  
per_frame_2=c=bnot(frame%2);      
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=s=10*sin(1.3*t);

per_frame_6=i=0;    x=0;     y=0;   p=0;    p1=pow(10,12);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=loop(1024*c,    sa=6.28*i/1024; 
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=p=p+ cos(sa-10*t)*sin(i*t)- sin(sa+10*t)*cos(i*t);        p1=p1+p;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=x=x+sin(p1);      y=y+cos(p1);
per_frame_13=d=sqrt(x*x+y*y);
per_frame_14=rad=.0001*pow(d,1.5);
per_frame_15=rad=if(above(rad,.005),.005,rad);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=gmegabuf(3*i)=x;     gmegabuf(3*i+1)=y;   gmegabuf(3*i+2)=rad ;
